items.sentence: Everybody knows Tom can\'t speak French very well.
I came to the conclusion that something was wrong.
I got to the bus stop just after the bus had left.
Tom wouldn\'t even let his wife apply for the job.
We have a lot of children\'s books in the library.
Yesterday I was caught in a shower on my way home.
I heard some students complain about the homework.
I heard that Tom and Mary have both been arrested.
I hope you and your wife can make it to our party.
I hope you will correct the situation immediately.
